name: Tic Tac Toe
description: A simple yet strategic two-player game where players take turns marking Xs and Os on a 3x3 grid to get three in a row.

name: Rock Paper Scissors
description: Rock, Paper, Scissors is a two-player game where rock beats scissors, scissors beats paper, and paper beats rock.

name: Memory Tiles
description: Memory Tiles is a game where you take turns flipping tiles to find matching pairs.
